import { useContext } from 'react'; import { useAuth0 } from "@auth0/auth0-react"; import './checkout-success.css'; const CheckoutSuccess = () => { const { isAuthenticated, loginWithRedirect } = useAuth0(); const cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')); const tax = parseFloat((cart.getTotalCost() * 0.1).toFixed(2)); return (
<>Order #: {}

Thank you for your order

Order Details

{cart.map((item) => ( ))}
Title Price Quantity Total
{item.title} ${item.price} {item.quantity} ${(parseFloat(item.price) * parseInt(item.quantity)).toFixed(2)}

Sub-Total: ${cart.getTotalCost().toFixed(2)}

Sales Tax: ${tax}

Grand Total: ${grandTotal}

) } export default CheckoutSuccess;
